entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #63645
  • Refactoring Suggestion: Change Signature for Type Parameters #63644
  • New Rename UI it too bright in dark theme :) #63643
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers
  • Account for using declarations in nested switch statement gotos #63655
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE
  • Don't include syntax tree's contents when throwing NFWs #63653
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix potential deadlock if we are previewing a rename change #63652
    Area-IDE
  • Delete publishing steps that are no longer needed #63651
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Refactoring constructor initializers to use primary constructors #63648
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Report an error for an unsupported type tests involving 'ref' structs. #63646
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Snap main to release/dev17.4 #63657
    Area-IDE
  • Use correct branch until VS snaps #63658
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update configs for 17.4p2 snap #63647
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add Newtonsoft.Json 13.0.1 dependency to InternalTools.props #63650
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add telemetry for the time and files outputted for source generators #63088
    Area-IDE
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Use 'checked' names for synthesized vb intrinsic operators #63604
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Revert - Don't allow parameter type changes on properties #63642
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Update CodeAnalysis.Testing dependency #63416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Convert workspaces and new document formatting integration tests to new framework #63610
    Area-IDE
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #63632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Delete Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.Desktop #63624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable nullable in C# keyword recommenders and their tests #63639
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60614
    Area-IDE
